channel.title: Comments on: Are All Cow Druids Lying Douchebags?

item.title: By: Wishbone
item.dc:creator: Wishbone
item.description:
The truth of the matter is I won all the mats needed for the opening.
Two towns over.
In a truth telling contest.
Also, this is pretty good Hornwood, but this isn't classic Hornwood. If you ever need some material you should definitely do a full piece on him. Just post on Medivh forums and ask for Hornwood stories.
item.content:encoded:
The truth of the matter is I won all the mats needed for the opening.

Two towns over.

In a truth telling contest.

Also, this is pretty good Hornwood, but this isn’t classic Hornwood. If you ever need some material you should definitely do a full piece on him. Just post on Medivh forums and ask for Hornwood stories.

item.title: By: Staarkhand
item.dc:creator: Staarkhand
item.description: I hate to break form, but not knowing Hornwood all I can say is that it's pretty funny to imply that Medivh bought all the supplies - they're not exactly sold by NPC vendors, so somebody had to farm them. I can't believe everyone who gathered 3 million linen happens to be employed by ubuygoldnowplzkiki.com but if they were and are now that much richer from the PvE uberguilds, uh, so?
item.content:encoded: I hate to break form, but not knowing Hornwood all I can say is that it’s pretty funny to imply that Medivh bought all the supplies – they’re not exactly sold by NPC vendors, so somebody had to farm them. I can’t believe everyone who gathered 3 million linen happens to be employed by ubuygoldnowplzkiki.com but if they were and are now that much richer from the PvE uberguilds, uh, so?

item.title: By: Kat
item.dc:creator: Kat
item.description: I believe Sir Fatherbones said it best. No one believed him in the first place - this is just icing on the cake.
item.content:encoded: I believe Sir Fatherbones said it best. No one believed him in the first place – this is just icing on the cake.

item.title: By: fatherbones
item.dc:creator: fatherbones
item.description: i'm also a Medivh resident that can atest to the fact that Hornwood is the lying-est liar in lie-town.
item.content:encoded: i’m also a Medivh resident that can atest to the fact that Hornwood is the lying-est liar in lie-town.

item.title: By: Fiver
item.dc:creator: Fiver
item.description: As a Medivh resident since WoW launched, I can indeed confirm that Hornwood is a lying douchebag. He of the famous "my kids got threatened irlz" lies, and the complete fabrication of physical threats from one of the community's most respected members (and subsequent deletion of those claims). Yes, Hornwood has something of a reputation for lying and douche-related containment.
item.content:encoded: As a Medivh resident since WoW launched, I can indeed confirm that Hornwood is a lying douchebag. He of the famous “my kids got threatened irlz” lies, and the complete fabrication of physical threats from one of the community’s most respected members (and subsequent deletion of those claims). Yes, Hornwood has something of a reputation for lying and douche-related containment.

item.title: By: Hyd
item.dc:creator: Hyd
item.description:
<blockquote>If someone touches you at night and says they're Foton or that they're touching you at Foton's behest, they're lying.</blockquote>
They told me they loved me. I suppose that's a lie too. :-)
item.content:encoded:
If someone touches you at night and says they’re Foton or that they’re touching you at Foton’s behest, they’re lying.

They told me they loved me. I suppose that’s a lie too. ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Shade
item.dc:creator: Shade
item.description:
Only been 2 afaik, Foton and Raster, and he only posted twice iirc.
However, I think the lines you quoted didn't really imply they were from afkgamer, and even if so, you fed them the line, no surprise they used it to wind you up :)
item.content:encoded:
Only been 2 afaik, Foton and Raster, and he only posted twice iirc.

However, I think the lines you quoted didn’t really imply they were from afkgamer, and even if so, you fed them the line, no surprise they used it to wind you up ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Chris
item.dc:creator: Chris
item.description: Asquo said more than one person worked on this site. Is that not true?
item.content:encoded: Asquo said more than one person worked on this site. Is that not true?

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
Hornwood just learned a couple of valuable lessons about the internet, kids.
Just to head off any future trouble, if someone sends you a tell in game claiming to be me or to roll with me, they're lying. If someone touches you at night and says they're Foton or that they're touching you at Foton's behest, they're lying. Plus you'd need some heavy duty therapy.
Class dismissed.
item.content:encoded:
Hornwood just learned a couple of valuable lessons about the internet, kids.

Just to head off any future trouble, if someone sends you a tell in game claiming to be me or to roll with me, they’re lying. If someone touches you at night and says they’re Foton or that they’re touching you at Foton’s behest, they’re lying. Plus you’d need some heavy duty therapy.

Class dismissed.
